description: Sean Cody’s first couple comes back after their debut together a few weeks ago, and this time they have a third joining them for Spring Break! Brysen just couldn’t say no! They started off by going to the beach for some fun, and then driving around before their final destination…that quickly turned into fondling, kissing and some sucking action…I guess that’s what you get when you put three horny studs together in a confined space. As soon as they got to a more private place, the real magic happened…
title: Brysen, Deacon & Asher's Spring Break
